title: 820 2915 no green light
message:
Hey,

This one, no liquid and no signs of corrosion or components knock out! 

I don't have green light! 

PPBUS - 1.3V 
PP3V4S_G3H -3.5V
SMC_BC_ACOK - 0V 

resistance 27/28 : 21 ohm
resistance 17/18 : 3.4 ohm 

already replace U7000 2 times same history.. The motherboard already turn on 2 times On! when it turn's on PPPBUS stay on 12.69V.. But after 1 min it goes down! 

any idea? 

thanks

title: 820 2915 no green light
message:
First of all check SMC_RESET_L.
Post basic voltages of U7000; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
Did you try known good DCIN board?

title: 820 2915 no green light
message:
First thing i did its try a new DC in! 

while i was check the voltages i noticed that voltage on pin 2 was wrong. Common R7005 problem. 

some times we look for the hard things and forget the basics! 

Thank you Mr.while i was check the voltages i noticed that voltage on pin 2 was wrong. 

Thank you Mr.Vali
